snippet: Syrian Army jets carried out at least 25 airstrikes on the city of Palmyra, held by the Islamic State, on Friday.
abstract: Syrian army carries out one of the most sustained government bombardments on city of Palmyra, held by Islamic State; at least 25 airstrikes kill 26, including a dozen ISIS militants.
lead_paragraph: Syrian Army jets carried out at least 25 airstrikes on the city of Palmyra, held by the Islamic State, on Friday.

headline.main: Syria: Army Strikes Kill 12 ISIS Fighters, Monitor Says
headline.print_headline: Middle East; Syria: Army Strikes Kill 12 ISIS Fighters, Monitor Says
